name: Dragon Tavern Adventure
description:
This is a short adventure game I created of a baby dragon finding its way home. It is game focused on having the player jump over obstacles as young Bart the Dragon tries to find his way home to his mom. All the art was obtained from the Unity Asset Store. Credit to LowlyPoly, Moonflower Carnivore, SnowFiend Studios, Dungeon Mason, and StoneSnail for the art assets and shaders used in the game. Credit to Michael Baker for the game mechanics. Credit to Adrian Villarespe for the cave background image used. Credit to SDFonts and Vic Fieger for the text used.  My work done is the level design where I used a form of tiling to create the levels.

ArtStation link: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/baGbvk
